title: UK survey : when most consumers will start their Christmas shopping in the UK in 2013
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of respondents in each Month on the y axis.
Month November has the highest Share of respondents and The week before Christmas has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 29.0 between the maximum Month November and minimum Month The week before Christmas.
